alert.note: Alert for Estill; Lee; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 5:49PM EDT until August 25 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Powell County in east central Kentucky... Southwestern Morgan County in southeastern Kentucky... Estill County in east central Kentucky... South central Menifee County in east central Kentucky... Northern Lee County in southeastern Kentucky... Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 549 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Palmer to Standing Rock to Murphyfork, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Palmer around 555 PM EDT. Fixer around 600 PM EDT. Fox around 605 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Stillwater and Landsaw. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Estill; Lee; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Wolfe
